name: Fire Is Life
description:
Help Garg save Flamio from the flood! Get Flamio to 20 health to win the game!

Controls

to move left 

to move right

to reset

to return to menu

Avoid the raindrops and the water to protect Flamio. Collect power ups to stop the flood!

Race against time to fully power up Flamio to stop the flood.

Or will you let Flamio be overcome by the flood?
